website_summaries.verdict: A premium adjustable bed that enables you to sleep at an incline, align your spine, and open your airway.
pros: Offers independent head and foot incline
Comes with dual USB charging ports, enabling you to charge your smartphone, tablet, and other devices while you sleep
Equipped with a wireless remote for added convenience
cons: Less durable than many comparable adjustable beds
Remote sometimes fails to perform properly

customer_reviews.title: Freaks out the cats!
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable cat removal system is a highly effective, technologically advanced method for evicting cats off the bed. It doesn’t move fast enough for the entertaining “catapult technique”. Instead, this cat removal system relies on stealth and confusion. There is something about quietly changing elevation and position that is highly unsettling to the feline constitution. I would absolutely recommend this product to anyone who needs to remove a feline overlord from the bed!
customer_reviews.author: weldrwomn

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep of my life
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this bed frame in the queen size. We have a regular spring mattress and a 3" memory foam topper. We were a little anxious about the mattress fitting well, but we got it set up and it fits perfectly. The mattress and topper work just fine with this frame. The box came and the frame was very easy to set up. Now we spend more time in our bed than on the couch. We absolutely love the ability to adjust the height of the head and feet. It's been a great purchase and has provided the best sleep we've had. We are 100% happy with our purchase and would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This was a really hard purchase because I could not try the adjustable bed out before buying, then there was picking a mattress without trying out, and mattress topper, mattress pad and sheet set.....I was overwhelmed to say the least. I relied on reviews, a site called "sidesleepers" and of course I enlisted the help of Amazon customer service to help me put all things together. I was so very impressed with this Adjustable Bed Base by LUCID...thanks everyone for steering me in the right direction.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: THE BED FLIPED ME UP AGAINST THE WALL
customer_reviews.text: I dropped the remote and when leaning to pick it up...THE BED FLIPED ME UP AGAINST THE WALL. Legs vs the width of the twin will flip the bed if you are on the edge of the mattress. Not for the elderly!
customer_reviews.author: J T Ho.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had this bed set up for 5 months and the lower portion already doesn’t raise all the way, anymore. I count to ten before it even BEGINS to raise, and then it only raises maybe three inches. I am very disappointed. I bought two (for split king) and one is still working, but my husband hardly raises it, so that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Lucid  W/communication big time.
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this bed frame & was delivered in front of house set on flowerbed, didn’t bother to ring the door bell. This thing weights a ton!! So I paid for GHS assembly & when the guy shows up, he informs me that he can’t move the box that weights a ton to the room I need it it. Thank god the mattress that I ordered showed up right after the assembly guy so that than could help him move the box with the bed frame in it that weights a ton. FYI.....HAVE BIG GUYS THERE TO MOVE THIS IDEM. THX GHS & XPO
customer_reviews.author: Sharol stiles

customer_reviews.title: An Answered Prayer
customer_reviews.text: The LUCID L300 Adjustable Bed Base is WONDERFUL!!! I can finally sleep in my bed again! For the past 6 months, I've only been able to sleep in my recliner. From the 2nd night we had the new base, I have truly slept. Oh, I still wake up in the middle of the night, but I don't need to GET up. My pain seems more manageable than it's been in a long time. Thank You, LUCID, for affordably allowing me to take my life back! Now, the disabilities I live with don't control me. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: adjustable legs
customer_reviews.text: The legs are too long. My mother is unable to get on the bed. The bed is supposed to have adjustable legs, so anybody can adjust the height to the level he/she can be comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: John Bar AL

customer_reviews.title: Don't Hesitate to Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great price! Easy to assemble out of box and room placement in less than 10 minutes. I purchased this item for my brother to help with his snoring and sleep apnea. It made a difference. I wished they made this in a full size. I would buy it in a New York minute.
customer_reviews.author: Romaney

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Bed base. Just as stated, it was so easy to put together. Two 70-year-old females had it put together and ready to use in about 1 hour. I love the wireless remote, it's so quiet. I had been sleeping in a recliner for a year because of back pain. Not anymore, I now sleep in my adjustable bed with no more back pain. I am so delighted I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Wixie J Skellett

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied! My wife and I have always thought about what it would be like to get a bed frame like this, and we finally did, and I could not be happier with choosing this one. The 2 XL frames came so fast to our front door, we dragged them in, ripped open the boxes, slid out the frame, and it was practically ready to go; all we had to do was twist on the legs and plug her in and done! We just have our king mattress on it for now and we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them at first, but then they malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: We bought two twin xls and synced them together for our king size mattress. At first we really loved them. They worked as good as bigger name brand bases. One of them was damaged when we got it. The plastic case that hold the button to lower them when the power goes off was cracked. But we overlooked it because we liked them. But after a few weeks the motor in the other one failed. Lost faith in them after that, so we returned them. As always Amazon provided great customer service. This was our second bad experience with cheaper brand bases, so I guess this is one of those cases where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: El Guapo

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 with my mattress. the one came ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 with my mattress. the one came defective. the wire to the power box was crimped and the wires exposed. I emailed immediately for a replacement. it should have been ovenighted to me, instead I am waiting a week for it. very disappointing as my husband is disabled and now we have to sleep on the floor until our frame gets here. to me that is unexceptable.. also, this remote does not pair together.. very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but questionable parts
customer_reviews.text: The beds came expediently and I was excited to get them setup for my aging grandparents! Overall, they appear to be good quality and operate as they should. However, most of the bushings were either completely broken off or cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Willyumm

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: It would be great, except that the whole shebang tipped over when I was getting out of bed, and dumped me on the floor, hurting my elbow. I got this to reduce my pain, not add to it. It's not stable enough when the head is raised, and i need the head up to get out of bed, that's the whole reason i got it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Best Bed Base Ever
customer_reviews.text: We have had our bed bases for over two weeks and absolutely love them. We originally bought these two Twin XL bed bases as guest beds that could be put together to form a king or split apart depending on the guest. We ended up loving these adjustable bases so much we kept them for ourselves! These bases are perfect for reading (which I do a lot of), watching TV or just relaxing. I posted a link to a video below showing the frame in action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money with buyers remorse
customer_reviews.text: The wireless remote stopped working after 9 days use. Tried troubleshooting using the owners manual and re-pairing remote - which did not fix issue. Product too large to return. Now stuck with a non operating bedframe. Complete wast of money
customer_reviews.author: BankerJohn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as the reviews were great, I have had it for 3 months and would return it if I could. Not at all happy with it. Do not waste your money. Cable was cut in package so they sent me another with no directions, it’s loud and not at all comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The brackets are very nice. They're sturdy and not hard to put on. The only problem I encountered was they came with no mounting instruction. All the parts needed were provided just not what goes where. I emailed Lucid and even though I had not purchased directly from them, they were very helpful. The Linenspa seller was very prompt in the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DonD

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable platform but not good as a split King
customer_reviews.text: This thing doesn't have anything to keep the mattresses from sliding left and right, only something at the foot. If you like your spouse, don't get the split King as there will constantly be a big crevice between you. Makes cuddling and night activity more difficult. Needs something to keep the mattresses tight together.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Torn top and foam .
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged. I’ve included a picture to show the huge tear in the fabric. The bed is still in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sunville

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best purchase I’ve made in years. I can’t think of one bad thing to say about it this bed. It was so easy to put together and set up and I love being able to adjust positions. I may never leave my room again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever for sore old bones!!!
customer_reviews.text: With the 10" mattress recommended for this bed I can sleep comfortably & actually awaken feeling rested. For the $, I heartily encourage anyone else stuck in a recliner... that you will be amazed at the comfort provided. Easy to set up (tho heavy to get into the house) the remote works easily & the motors are very quiet. Read the ad, it is all true... just make sure you order xl sheets if you get the twin. The only thing I would like to see added is a stop of some sort to keep the pillows from falling off (there is one on the foot).
customer_reviews.author: The Old Hen House

customer_reviews.title: Look nicer than the quality put in to them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two to make up a split King- on one, Part of the upholstered frame is made of some sort of wood or composite and was broken and the sub thing was screwed on all ghetto like- looks like it was defective and someone tried to fix it before returning it... and on the other one of the legs were bent and do not thread on right. I had to get these up stairs by my self cause my husband needs surgery and cannot lift anything, only to find out they are both defective. I can't afford to return them just to have to repeat that process, or I would.
customer_reviews.author: A. GOEDEL

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Horrible!  Extremely poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: No 24/7 support as advertised. Bed came wrongly manufactured, and could not connect power to operate. Manual showed one thing, bed showed the manufacture was in error. Could not contact the seller in spite of the 24/7 support offered. I am disabled and have no bed to sleep on. Terrible situation.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Great product- good price.
customer_reviews.text: Was so easy to put together. Love the USB ports. So, so comfy to sit up and read or watch TV in bed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ccshops

customer_reviews.title: Too high!
customer_reviews.text: I like this purchase. Definitely worth the money. But, it’s way too high with the 12” legs. my wife needs a stool to get into bed. Lucid wants $80 for shorter legs, x2 because I bought 2 twin XL’s... Really should be included in my opinion. However, because I’ll need to chuck in another $200 I’m just going to return these and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kang Va

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING ATER ONLY 5 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adjustable frame with Lucid's 12" matress for my bed bound mother, to help her better sit up and eat etc. It was wonderful at first, but then the entire adjustable motor died out only 5 months into her using it, leaving her only able to lay down flat again. To say I am disgusted is an understatement. I cannot reach anyone to contact for a replacement. Due to this I strongly advise you shop for another, better brand so this doesn't happen to you too.
customer_reviews.author: RealTalk

customer_reviews.title: Solid well made bed with EZ assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these and I am very pleased. Quiet motor, solid construction, wireless lighted remote, and solid construction. We placed 14" memory foam mattresses on this and it is a fantastic combination. I purchased when on sale and wish I had purchased two more! Easy assembly too. Just unfold out of the box and plug in the wall for the motors to have power. Also a plus are the 2 USB power ports on each outside rail (4 total per bed) where you can conveniently charge your devices. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Greybeard

customer_reviews.title: Great low price & basic adjustable frame
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, supportive, and sensible... what can be wrong with an adjustable frame that meets all the basic needs at a low cost? I got ours when the Lucid products were on sale and two of these with the king size mattress was what my family finally needed. When you look at what’s on the market, you could easily spend double, if not triple, to cost with other models that may offer just a little more. Go with the sensible option... you wallet will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sween

customer_reviews.title: Just right for price
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and very useful. Been using for 3 weeks for elderly person. Raising head and feet been backsaver for us caretakers. Helps with elevating for reflux. Has a flat button and a memory button on the remote. So you can hit flat and it will lower head and feet to flat. If you hit memory, it goes back to your favorite position. Only negatives- legs are piled that screw on. So not for sliding around or rough housing. Can only raise with remote. The bed has an emergency flat button on it should the remote not work. Overall, great product for price. Just right!
customer_reviews.author: craftylady

customer_reviews.title: Might not fit average sized body with Twin XL mattress in upright position.
customer_reviews.text: An affordable adjustable bed base, but I had issue were the head half bends. I use a Twin XL mattress. I am on average height at 5" 9" but when the head is elevated, the edge of the mattress only reaches to my neck. I ended up dropping pillows between the wall and gap to support my head properly. The bend point needs to be about 6-8 inches closer to the foot for a better body fit. Despite this issue, I am getting great night's rest in a recliner like position even when side sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: J. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love.  It needs a 5 star but read my negatives .
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed. It's easy to use. We are in our 70's and we put it together. A little high for me at 5' 5". I will adapt. Now the brackets, bought separately, are so confusing I did not use them. Only thing I wish is when they made the hand controller, they would have put a hole thru it so you could perhaps attach it to the bed or hang up. I dropped it on the floor in the middle of the night and the bed head and bottom were up and I couldn't put them down until I retrieved the controller.
customer_reviews.author: Babag

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: The bed is nice. It is super easy to set up and comfortable to use. The manufactuer suggested grippie pads to help keep the mattress in place for my elderly mother who struggles with mobility in certain situations. Excellent customer service: they addressed my concerns quickly found a great solution and truly cared about my issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many of the adjustable bed frames ranging from $600-$1500 (XL Twin), I found LUCID L300 which looked the identical for the most part as those other high priced frames but as a lower price. Receiving two of the frames (to make a King size), I was impressed by the quality of the frame, motors, and overall design. Well worth it for the price. One of the motor cables got damaged in shipment and Customer Service was great in getting me out a replacement within 2-days! Great bed frame, great company!
customer_reviews.author: akotoff2001

customer_reviews.title: 1year in and holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: I love our adjustable base, and don't know why we didn't buy one sooner. It is heavy and we have had ours over a year now. It is still going strong. It does not have every feature but is great for the price. Just remember to add batteries so when the power goes out it won't leave you flat. It is very easy to assemble as we have moved so it has been set up twice now, just heavy. I wish for my hips and back we would have dont this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 6 poles are broken within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We have received this item around 3 months ago. 2 of the 6 Poles are broken already and cannot be adjusted anymore. We have tried to contact the seller to get replacements through Amazon, but were not able to get the contact details
customer_reviews.author: Christoph Clüver

customer_reviews.title: Split king 12” mattress
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Motor is powerful and quiet and set up was easy peasy. Now we just wait and see how long it lasts. I am disappointed there’s no preset zero gravity, but overall a great adjustable base. The mattress is hard as a rock. I’m hoping it will soften up after we have it longer, but it does seem like it will last a long time since it is so firm. Overall, great buy for the price and I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsalad Jazzmatron

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable bed we have ever slept on !!
customer_reviews.text: We are both in our 80's and my wife has Parkinson's. The adjustability of this bed has been a life-saver for my wife, and for my back. I no longer have to hold her up for long periods of time to give her liquids or medication. Hit the remote and up goes the mattress. Silently I might add. She also needs her feet elevated for medical reasons and all I have to do is push a button. I unpacked and set up this bed by myself but I would recommend that you get someone to help you. It's easily assembled but the frame is heavy. This bed is honestly one of the wisest buys of our lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Economical adjustable bed
customer_reviews.text: Basic adjustable bed base at a very good price. Remote functions are not fancy, just your basic head and foot up and down. There is a memory button, that if you like certain position, you can program to remember. Also one button for flat position. Motor functions well and is fairly quiet. Assembly was super easy. Bought two twin xl's to make split king bed to use with new Sleep Number mattress. Works great. Only 4 stars because 1 had a few broken washers upon receipt. Called the company and they shipped replacement very fast. They could maybe be packed a little better for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Bought the Lucid L300 split king bed
customer_reviews.text: The wife and I love this bed, this is the best buy. No regrets here whatsoever. Remote control for each of us. Watching or reading in bed is so easy. The memory position is so easy to set up. The product is very durable, as I weigh 240 lbs and the motors are strong. If you have back pain you need this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful price and product
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I have had this in my cart wanting to replace my temperpedic adjustable bed that has been messing up. I finally did it and am so glad I did. I bought one twin xl to see if I liked it and we love it so much we bought the other half to replace my husbands side. It literally took 5 minutes to set up and is just as sturdy as our temperpedic. I feel like an idiot for not buying this one first
customer_reviews.author: Asht

customer_reviews.title: Broken after only 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these beds 2 months and one has already stopped working. I am very disappointed and unhappy in the poor quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: EVaughter

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought a split king set, and one of the beds and one of the mattresses were fine in shipping. The other bed frame had cords cut and corners broken from shipping. Packaging looked OK, but it had been dropped or fell on a corner, and the other mattress the box was pretty damaged, and the mattress partially inflated/bursting out of box. (mattress was otherwise un damaged.) had to get the broken bed replaced, and now I have to deal with flipping heavy box, drag it to UPS to get shipped back. A bit of foam would have prevented this I think.
customer_reviews.author: AICvideo

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable bed EXCEPT legs are too tall.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this now for 5 months. Love how it adjusts, quiet motor. Great remote, USB ports difficult position to use. Unfortunately the legs are 12 inches making the bed way too tall for most people. They have adjustable legs for this bed, but you will need to pay an extra $50 to buy them. They should come standard with the bed. Also, my last adjustable bed frame had a battery backup in case of a power outage. This one does not. It is difficult to get out of if you cannot lie it flat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, Quiet, affordable. What I liked least is there was no way to attach a headboard. Great bed though and no problems with delivery or putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taking comfort to another level
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to buy a bed online without properly inspecting it and testing it out. With this adjustable bed base, everything seems to be as described and more. It is well put together. It is solid and sturdy. The motor is quiet and the adjustable bed frame adds tremendous value to almost any mattress. This purchase is for a disable elderly, but I have fallen in love with its luxurious accommodation and planning to purchase another for myself. You can nit-pick this frame for the lack of height adjustment, or that it doesn't provide you with a "built-in-tv". As a bed frame, this adjustable bed base takes comfort to another level.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This base was so well priced that I was a bit nervous about what I would be getting! It is great! Was so well laid out that it was quick and easy to put together ( really is 5 minute assembly) and works great. The remote lights up, has a custom pre set position button, and a very speedy “flat” command button. Each of the two units that make up the split king has a double USB port on each side. The bases can be used as a king or as two twins. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Needs i improvement
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Bed adjusts great but they should strap together in the middle. Creates a whole to fall in when you pit them together to form a king bed
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two twin XL bases and put a king latex foam mattress on top. Very happy with this setup!! Since I am pregnant, I wanted to sleep at an incline to help with acid reflux, and this base is perfect for that. My husband likes that he can raise both head and foot sections and work on his laptop in bed. The only tough part was moving the heavy, unwieldy shipping box upstairs, so we cut open the box and moved pieces separately (base first then legs, remote, power cord and instructions). Assembly took 5 minutes per bed.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Finally an affordable adjustable base!!
customer_reviews.text: As someone with sciatic nerve pain from working in a standing/walking job all day I appreciate this bed frame incredibly! Bringing my feet up in a natural and supported position (I used to sleep with pillows behind my knees) has made a huge difference for me. So easy to assemble that I did it by myself (45 y/o woman). Memory position is pre-set on the remote and there's no way to change it, but that's a small detail, I love everything else about this adjustable base (especially the low price$$). Base is upholstered, sturdy, and adjusts to very deep angles compared to competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Wandering Woods

customer_reviews.title: damaged and defective. bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 with my mattress. one came defective. the wire to the power box is cut and the wires exposed. the one that works also has some damage to the motor at the same exact place, but it works fine for now. I will be contacting them for a replacement. Will update my review and ratings based on my experience with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PDR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy. Broke within a week.
customer_reviews.text: The bed was fairly easily to assemble. The only problem is that the bottom piece broke and wouldn’t incline after about a week when I heard a loud noise while lifting the feet with just me (165 lbs) and my dog (18 lbs). Returning this big adjustable bed via UPS was impossible after multiple store visits. Had Pilot pick it up a week ago. Still haven’t heard back or know where my money is after multiple phone calls. Wouldn’t try to save money by purchasing this bed. Get a Malouf or one of the other higher end bed frames so you don’t have to deal with the headache that this adjustable bed frame has caused me.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest assembly I've ever seen. They're barely exaggerating when they say 5 minutes, and so far it's been absolutely awesome. The motor is quiet, but not silent, but for my needs I'm not moving it very often, so it's great for what I need. Remote feels kind of cheap, but it does what it's supposed to. Will update later if durability or anything negatively affects my opinion, but I'm happy right now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Quick working quickly
customer_reviews.text: My review is a little hard to understand. To clarify. I have 5 stars for comfort and pain relief...it’s super easy to set up and the remote is easy to understand. I rated it a 1 however because it’s been less than 3.5 weeks since set up and one of the twin xl beds we have is no longer working. You don’t even hear the motor turning as if it’s trying to elevate the head or feet. Very disappointed as we saved for a long time to upgrade our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable base bedframe was super easy to put together. I disabled the USB connectors as I already have them in the bedroom wall. The bedframe is sturdy and works very well. I have the split king - 2 twin units. They each were pretty heavy to place by myself. You'll need 2 people for queen size units to move and assist with turning over and placing in your bedframe. I already have 2 other friends purchasing this unit once they saw ours.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Adjustable Bed Base
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and was not hard to assemble. You have to screw in the legs. Due to the weight, we couldn't follow the instructions to add legs and then flip over. We added legs one by one while supporting the base on paint cans. Took less than 20 minutes. It was worked smoothly. It is sooo much cheaper than the furniture stores. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SDB

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable base!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 twin XL’s to use with a latex king mattress. Quick delivery. They were very easy to setup and syncing the remote was a breeze. Didn’t realize the headboard brackets were listed as “one size” when I ordered the bed, so am waiting now for them to arrive. Thank you Linenspa.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Grandma

customer_reviews.title: I bought this 1 year ago, great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one year ago so this review is based on long term usage and I weigh 250lbs (+/-). It’s very easy to set up. Remote is programmable for one preferred setting. Because of my back problems and multiple surgeries, I adjust the bed many times each night from flat to the top section being fully upright and/or the bottom upright as well and have had no mechanical problems at all. This was a great purchase because it’s high quality and low cost.
customer_reviews.author: SmithEJ7334

customer_reviews.title: Frame not made for a headboard
customer_reviews.text: There were/are no holes in the bed frame to attach the headboard brackets. I am waiting for my brother to visit from out of state to drill the holes so I can attach the brackets and the headboard
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Files

customer_reviews.title: DO IT! EASY INSTALL AND STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased this and put it together last night. I LOVE IT!. Set up was super easy...heavy so you need at least two strong people but it was so simple. I have a king and sincing the beds together could not have been simpler....It is really sturdy and raises my bed to much nicer level too...I was skeptical to purchase such a large purchase through amazon but am really glad I did. I kept the boxes just in case there were any issues as some prior reviews stated but I do not forsee any problems....I have been waiting for this for years and am very pleased. I am giving this one a thumbs up for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marmel06

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable bed!
customer_reviews.text: I am duly impressed with this frame. I bought the double bed as it was just for me. It was easy to assemble even for me at 73 years young. I love the USB ports as I can charge my phone and e-reader (there's 4 of them; 2 on each side). The remote was a plus with a built in flash light, but I surely liked the one touch button to make the bed flat. The touch buttons light up also. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Culbertson

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model adjustable bed frame and mattress after I got out of the hospital from a fall that resulted in 2 broken legs and a broken arm. This is one of the best investments I’ve made. My only concern is the mattress tends to slide to the side. There are brackets at the bottom of the bed to keep it from sliding down but it needs something from sliding to the side. I have tried mattress grippers and they help some but there is still slippage but I LOVE the bed and the mattress. The price for both was quite good another positive
customer_reviews.author: PeggyS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, but pay attention to the directions.
customer_reviews.text: This came as a well packed, easy to assemble adjustable bed. It does take two people to assemble due to the bulkiness of the frame and the weight. Pay attention when you screw in the legs, NOT to get a wire pinched, it is easy to do. (They do mention this in the instructions). The bed was easy to pair with the remote. It has really helped relieve my gastric reflux and so much more comfortable than the pillow contraption I was attempting to use. Usually sleep through the night now.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with our new Lucid L300 Adjustable Bed Base. It was very easy to set up. It is well built, and the motors are very quiet and smooth. The USB charging ports on both sides of the bed will be very helpful. My wife and I are excited to upgrade our bed, and see how it improves our rest. It's definitely time, I'm sure we will sleep better, and we'll be more productive throughout the day. I'm not sure why I waited so long, but I'm happy I found our new bed!
customer_reviews.author: 1st time order

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has severe back ache and has not been able to find a comfortable bed/mattress for close to 10 years. He now is sleeping better, waking up pain free, and no one has to listen to him complain anymore. The bed is well made and easy to assemble. The mattress is very comfortable while providing support. If you want comfort and quality at a very reasonable price look no further because this is it.
customer_reviews.author: RWK

customer_reviews.title: I found an upholstered headboard/frame that works with this
customer_reviews.text: When you look at the pictures they show the base with an upholstered headboard/frame, but it isn't clear how to purchase that. I really wish they would have made it clearer. I took a chance and found one that worked. Flash Furniture Roxbury Tufted Upholstered Queen Size Platform Bed in Beige Fabric. I purchased the frame at the same time as the adjustable base and everything arrived on the same day. I had to remove the wood ledges from the inside of the the frame so that the adjustable base would sit down inside of it, but after they are removed, everything fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S

customer_reviews.title: Great adjustable frame and great price. We hit the jackpot with this one.
customer_reviews.text: After doing several days of research, we were looking for a budget level adjustable bed frame. I have to say we definitely hit the jackpot with this adjustable frame. It is smooth, relatively quiet, very well made, and it has USB ports which was a bonus. The only thing I'm missing is a remote that has more features on it but at this price you cant beat the value that you get. I will definitely recommend the Lucid L300 adjustable bed frame to others. Just for reference we got 2 x twin XLs to make the split king.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Garner

customer_reviews.title: Medically a blessing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the xl twin king split adjustable for me and my husband due to my legs swell really bad and all the pillows or wedges I bought are horrible. I Have had no prob with my legs since putting it together. I also have asthma and sinus and allergies so i can leave it propped up when needed. took less then 5 min to put togher. Very great price i recommend it to anyone needing to buy a adjustable bed. Priced these style beds over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised, this thing really is good.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this product delivers. For that matter, it came with free delivery. The product works as advertised. The motors are reasonably quiet and the remote is easy to use. The USB charging hubs underneath are a nice touch. However, the USB hubs are the older, slower chargers, so they don't work too well with newer devices. The claim of a 5-minute assembly is optimistic but close. It takes longer to unpack and unpackage the product than it does to put together. The only knock I have is that the raising and lowering is a tad slow, but that isn't enough of an issue to knock off a star.
customer_reviews.author: berklaw

customer_reviews.title: My husband did not snore last night!!
customer_reviews.text: Set up as advertised, with clear instructions. Last night was the first night my husband did not snore in years. I have been wanting an adjustable bed since my sister came home with one but hers had cost $4,000, and I just could not justify that price tag. When I finally went looking I bought this one because of the solid reviews for the lower price. Very happy with this purchase. This adjustable bed is a great option if you don't need the vibration feature and are trying to stay in the lower price bracket. If we have any issues in the future I will update this review to report on them.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed close to a year ago and I do love my bed. I would love it more if it had the safety brackets on the side because the mattress slides off some few times a day. I use a foam mattress and with the cool cover and without it still happens. Other than that the bed is perfect. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nice shopper

customer_reviews.title: If they made anew model...
customer_reviews.text: We have had ours for 2 years now. Everything is great and perfect. If they were to make a new model, the only thing I would change is to have mattress bars on the outside (like they do on bottom) because our mattresses slide over edge every few days. Also, I would have a zero gravity setting on the remote, bc i can never figure out were to put it so it will put the least pressure on my back.
customer_reviews.author: lindseymae

customer_reviews.title: yessssssssssssssssss
customer_reviews.text: Dont even question it, just get it! We got two as a split king today and had it all assembled in less than10 minutes. We tested them out and they work great! Take up less space than a normal king bedframe! I am very pleased. Will update if anything goes wrong but so far ive been pleased with Lucid. To go with these bases we got two twin xl 10" lucid hybrid mattresses. Comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly & Rene (But mostly Kelly)

customer_reviews.title: Before I could use the bed It was falling apart ...
customer_reviews.text: Before I could use the bed It was falling apart the support for the foot connection started breaking down because the wood is particle board
customer_reviews.author: Ophie

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great buy
customer_reviews.text: One lift motor arrived separated from the bed frame and had to be reassembled. I was fortunate to have the skill set to reassemble the motor or a return would have been in order. Because of the weight of the item, handling by the delivery firm was poor and obviously rough which showed with scrapes and tears in the card board exterior packaging. Delivery is the biggest problem that Amazon needs to solve. Bed, itself is excellent, lift motors work well and my sleep is much improved! Apart from the damage to the lift motor, the assembly is simple and can be done easily with two people because of the relative weight. Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker10

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very quiet as advertised. Made of heavier materials than exspected.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are pleased with our purchase. We ordered 2 bed bases and will update our review after we use them for some time. My only complaint is the shipping company. One in particular, UPS who treats all their packages with zero respect. One of our bases was shipped FedEx without issue. The other came later the same day UPS and had been drop on one corner and slightly bent a part of the frame.{ it had no bearing on how it worked } I'm hard pressed as to why they do not respect other peoples goods and never have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't try this alone
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed with the 12" Lucid mattresses. The assembly is easy, just screw on 4 legs and connect one cable. However the web site indicates one person assembly but that is not very realistic. The king size bed comes in four large, heavy boxes, each one marked with some variation of "Heavy, Team Lift Only" The user manual also states that to turn the bed over for assemble requires 2 to 4 people. In summary, great bed and very comfortable, but have help when it gets delivered and you start the setup.
customer_reviews.author: George McKewen

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, great function!
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about an adjustable bed, jump right off and into this bed! Our mattress is more comfortable than ever, and we're both able to work comfortably in bed now with the adjustable feature. Lifts well, is not as quiet as the top-end models, but for the price it's fine. The remote is great, has an integrated flashlight, which comes in handy. Super easy to set up and install, less than 5 minutes once we got it up the stairs. It is HEAVY so you will definitely need at least 2 people to get it into your bedroom (Queen size, at least). Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Simple and perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, easy to operate and very quiet. I have a king size bed so I ordered two twin xl and the two sides sync perfectly to operate as one unit. Could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shiwibaby

customer_reviews.title: It's a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to put together. My husband did it on his own, so if you have the strength it can be done alone. I think it should come with the adjustable legs, because they are almost 12 inches and with a 12 inch mattress this is high for an older person to handle. I have ordered the adjustable legs, but that means another $52 dollars and taking it apart and reassembling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't delay; get one today
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. It is easy to assemble, although pretty tricky to flip over and you need at least 2 people. Head and feet adjust as expected. Trying to find an adjustable base with a memory button but without massaging was extremely difficult. This is the only one I found and it is fantastic. Seems well constructed and beats the price of the competition. There really isn't a reason not to get one, or two, if you're doing a split king. Do be advised that if you link two units, you can only use one remote. Don't have ours linked so that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Weinstein

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how the platform would work with our bed frame, but it perfectly inside. We tested out the motor, and it was quiet and smooth. We haven’t slept in it yet, cause the mattress is still rising. (I’ll update later after we’ve slept on it.) All-in-all, it took about 45 minutes for two adults (one strong and not so strong) to remove the old mattress and bed slats, then put together and drop in the new platform and roll out the new bed. Fairly easy process. Just a bit cumbersome because of how heavy the frame and bed are. It’s helpful to have someone stringer helping.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great bed base, should have went king size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months and I love this thing! I had need to replace my base of my queen size (don’t ask) and was looking forward to picking out an adjustable bed base. Been doing about a month of YouTube reviews and finally settled on the Lucid 300, based on a sturdy frame, and not needing bells and whistles like under bed lighting and massaging. The only thing I’d choose over, and it’s no fault of the bed base, I should have upgraded to a king size frame and mattress so the wife and I could have gotten individual bed adjustable sides, you can’t with a queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: G2N

customer_reviews.title: Super cool.
customer_reviews.text: This box is HEAVY. Lawrd. Getting it to the bedroom was a struggle. Assembly was super quick and easy. Out of the box it was way easier to move around (have to flip after attaching legs and had no problem with 2 people). The product is very high quality- I love the upholstered dark grey sides. 11.5 inches of clearance from floor to bottom of frame. The motor is very quiet!! I was surprised and pleased. I felt a bit.... "extra" when I bought it. But I'm thrilled to have it and I know it'll get a ton of use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it, they thought of everything.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal for the price. Easy to assemble, but awkward to flip after putting the legs on, so have a partner for that part. I got two twin xl to make a King. Mine creaks a little bit but my wife's side doesn't. Weird. They thought of everything, Built in USB for charging phones or tablets, a flashlight on the remote, backlit buttons, a single button for going back to flat, and a memory setting for that one perfect position you found that one time, but can't find again. All in all Well Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the product in January 17,2019 and did not open box till February 1st. We’ve been using it for my dad that’s disabled and the Motor just stopped working yesterday, April 29,2019 I called customer service and they helped me fix it. Everyone was so kind and super helpful. I was freaking out because I use it as a hospital bed for my dad. They were able to troubleshoot over the phone and all I needed was to reset the remote. They were ready to send me a new motor if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: love this bed
customer_reviews.text: love this bed, don't know how I lived without it. Packaged was well done and the instructions clear. the bed is heavy requiring additional help to get into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard J. Waclawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable base came super quick. The easiest thing I have ever set up!! Other than it is a bit heavy, a good thing! I only had one guy helping me. We screwed on the 6 legs, plugged it in and that was it! Oh, even the batteries were included in the remote box, I missed them at first. The bars holding the mattress will never fall off like other brand reviews I saw. Also, it fit right in the old frame after taking out the box springs and board slats! I am totally satisfied with this purchase! I am sure sleeping will be so comfortable now for my elderly mother. We kept her old mattress, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tweetie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful/updated
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bed. Love it. It really helps my leg circulation and my back. Was easy to put together, just the legs and plug it in. UPDATE: One big problem is the cylinders, which make the bed go up and down, on the leg portion of the bed seem to break easily. I had it up and suddenly there was a big pop, and the next thing I know, it's not working the way it should. It only goes up a small bit now. Will still keep.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Baker

customer_reviews.title: Wish We had purchased this instead of the expensive one we bought a few years ago!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! It was very easy to set up. The box was pretty heavy so you’ll probably need to have help getting it up the stairs. I previously owned an adjustable bed split king set from another manufacturer for 5K and it had problems from the get go. I had to replace the one side with this. Wish I had gone this route first. I would have saved a ton of money. The previous one made it to the end of the limited warranty (3) years then, kaput!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 year old daughter who has scoliosis she had major back surgery at 12 now she’s 16 decided to try an adjustable bed frame, chose this one and I’m glad I did works perfectly! First frame cane with severed cable to the motor, customer service at Amazon immediately sent replacement and sent UPS carrier to get defective one. Overall great product and great experience! She loves the frame and I am thinking about getting me one too!
customer_reviews.author: Willie T Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good quality! Durable
customer_reviews.text: I went to mattress box store that wanted $1k for this same item but I got it for $400 less thru Amazon. And it got delivered for free! Assembly was easy; just needed two people because of weight. It’s very durable construction just like box store brand. P.S. I’ve had it for about 3 weeks now and I tell everyone the deal I got.
customer_reviews.author: JPange

customer_reviews.title: Can't attach to adjustable bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the brackets are any good, there was no place to attach them to the bed frame. I didn't have the equipment or know how to drill a hole to attach the brackets to the frame. So, my headboard is leaning against the wall, unattached.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer service!! Love my base!
customer_reviews.text: It took me months to find someone to set this up for me. Worked perfect but then the head motor went out. Contacted the seller and had almost instant response and troubleshooting directions. Found the motor wasn’t working so the seller replaced it soooo fast! He also told me where I could order shorter legs (Walmart) so now even in these crazy RONA RIOT days the seller was able to get my wonderful base working again. Would definitely buy again. Five stars is not enough! 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.author: Pattie R. Deville

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame over a year ago and have had no issues. I adjust the head and foot height throughout the night, as needed. It gives me relief from acid re-flux and from tired, achy legs. I love this paired with the Lucid 12in mattress. I miss my bed when I have to sleep elsewhere! I like the cordless remote but I sometimes "lose" it during the night. I have even knocked it off the bed onto the hardwood floor and had to crawl under the bed during the night to find the batteries! I wish I had a solution for a safe place to keep it handy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Freisthler

customer_reviews.title: Leg broke down right after I installed it
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs that was already installed on the frame broken down immediately when I put it on the floor - or it may have been broken already. How can i get this leg replaced?
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Goo Kang

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fit into our king size frame while my husband just uses box spring. We each got the 14in Lucid twin xl memory foam mattress. Our mattresses ended up only being about 1/2 difference in height. I have medical issues with my legs and breathing so this works great for me. When we go to bed I have it set to flat so we have a kingsize bed, and then when I am ready to go to sleep I hit the memory button and it raise the head and legs to where I have it preset to. If I need, it is no problem to adjust either more. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Oh, wow! Love this bed! Works like a charm! Easy set up, although best with two people due to it's bulk and weight. Just screw on six legs and hand tighten, plug in two cords and put the included batteries into the remote! It's that simple. I have an eight inch memory foam mattress on my bed and it's soooo comfortable when using the adjustable settings! My neck and spine fell better already! I would buy this bed again and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John Holroyd

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We got these along with Lucid hybrid mattresses. The frame works well, without having too many extra features. Our quality of sleep has improved. I could have spent twice as much at a local bed store -- I'm sure glad that I didn't. Set up was easy -- I did it by myself. We got a set of two so that we end up with a king bed. The only thing that I wish they came with was a pair of clips for holding the two sides of the bed together. But, a couple of large zip ties did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LUCID L300 Bed Base 5 Minute Assembly Adjustable, Twin XL, Charcoal
product_meta.description: Style:Adjustable Base Only| Size:Twin XLThe Lucid L300 Adjustable Bed Base takes your Netflix movie night, detective novel, and breakfast in bed to a new level of comfort. Simply push a button on the Wireless remote to find the perfect comfort position for you. Plus, it takes just 5 minutes to assemble and ships quickly. Enjoy exciting features like independent head and foot incline, dual USB charging ports, Wireless remote with flashlight, and a programmable memory position. The motor is whisper-quiet and will not interrupt your favorite TV show binge. The attractive upholstered frame adds to the style of your master suite. The bed base is backed by a 10-year warranty and is available in both Queen and Twin XL sizes. Remember 2 Twin XL bases make a King size bed. Just push them together for individualized comfort for you and your partner or sync them with the Wireless remote control. Twin XL measures 37.5 x 79.5 x 15 inches.
feature_bullets: First-ever folding hinge makes shipping more affordable, and assembly effortless. Takes less than 5 minutes from box to bed; no expert assembly needed.
Independent head incline: 0 - 60 degrees, foot incline 0 - 45 degrees. Premium motor is extremely reliable, quiet, and responsive.
Wireless remote with flashlight and programmable memory option for your favorite position. Batteries included.
Dual USB charging stations on both sides of bed base feature a fast charge and regular charge port.
750 lb weight capacity; Twin XL measures 37.5 x 79.5 x 15 inches
Upholstered frame in charcoal gray adds stylish look; 10-year Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,780 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
